title: 209 - The Next Great Move In The Stock, Gold, and Crypto Markets (Avi Gilburt)
description: Stocks, gold, and crypto all seem to be covered in bad news and beaten down prices. When can investors expect things to turn around? Brian and Avi discuss what sentiment is saying about the future of these markets and how investors can potentially benefit.
content:encoded: Stocks, gold, and crypto all seem to be covered in bad news and beaten down prices. When can investors expect things to turn around? Brian and Avi discuss what sentiment is saying about the future of these markets and how investors can potentially benefit.
